item.title: Alpha Beta
item.description: An amazing trick to blow away anyone watching (but not if they’ve seen the setup…) Prepare the deck as such: A…..AA…..A Pick a card from the bottom, black, half. Place it face up between the two aces Let the spectator pick a card from the top half.

item.title: The CCDL
item.description: A simple trick with a double lift ending. Allow the spectator to freely choose any card, then place it back in the deck, with a small bit sticking out. CC and false shuffles Double Lift Reveal

item.title: The Forced Card... Twice
item.description: A very simple control and force. Offer the spectator to fairly choose any card. Place it back on top (or do a control like CC). Do a false riffle shuffle, preserving the top card (or any control shuffle; I just find that the riffle works the best). Let you spectator touch any card. Then square up the deck, with that card sticking out; turn your hand and pull off the top card.
